name: ANTSUseDeformationFieldToGetAffineTransform
description: Extracts an affine transform from a deformation field. The input deformation field is expected to be in the same physical space as the images you want to transform.

inputs.name: Deformation Field
inputs.description: The input deformation field in NIfTI format (e.g., zzzWarp.nii.gz).

inputs.name: Load Ratio
inputs.description: Ratio of points to be loaded from deformation field to save memory (ex: 0.01).

inputs.name: Transform Type
inputs.description: Type of transform to be extracted. Can be 'rigid' or 'affine'.

inputs.name: Output Affine
inputs.description: The output file where the affine transform will be saved (e.g., OutAffine.txt).

inputs.name: Mask
inputs.description: Optional mask file defining the region from which points will be selected.

output-files.name: Output Affine Transform
output-files.description: The output is the affine transformation matrix file.

author: ANTs developers
